abstract: AOL will move its headquarters from Dulles, Va., next spring as it tries to retool itself as an advertising company that competes with the likes of Google, Yahoo and Microsoft.
snippet: AOL will move its headquarters from Dulles, Va., next spring as it tries to retool itself as an advertising company that competes with the likes of Google, Yahoo and Microsoft.
lead_paragraph: IT’S not a literal move to Madison Avenue, but it’s close.

headline.main: Moving Downtown: AOL Seeks New Image
headline.print_headline: Moving Downtown: AOL Seeks New Image

abstract: Experts said a European antitrust ruling might signal problems for companies like Apple, Intel and Qualcomm.
snippet: Experts said a European antitrust ruling might signal problems for companies like Apple, Intel and Qualcomm.
lead_paragraph: LUXEMBOURG, Sept. 17 — Europe’s second-highest court delivered a stinging rebuke to Microsoft Monday, but the impact of the decision upholding an earlier antitrust ruling may extend well beyond the world’s largest software maker to other high-technology companies.

headline.main: Microsoft Ruling May Bode Ill for Other Companies
headline.print_headline: EUROPEAN COURT FAULTS MICROSOFT ON COMPETITION

byline.original: By Kevin J. O'Brien and Steve Lohr

abstract: The company plans to announce the creation of I.B.M. Lotus Symphony, free programs for word processing, spreadsheets and presentations.
snippet: The company plans to announce the creation of I.B.M. Lotus Symphony, free programs for word processing, spreadsheets and presentations.
lead_paragraph: I.B.M. plans to mount its most ambitious challenge in years to Microsoft’s dominance of personal computer software, by offering free programs for word processing, spreadsheets and presentations.

headline.main: I.B.M. to Offer Office Software Free in Challenge to Microsoft’s Line
headline.print_headline: I.B.M. to Offer Office Software Free In Challenge to Microsoft’s Line
